OPEN.p:
Usage: EXEC:OPEN URI:[URL]
Opens a GUI window pointing to the specified URL.

FM.Open.p:
Usage: EXEC:FM.Open
Opens the J File Manager in a window.

Terminal.JELF.p:
Usage: EXEC:Terminal.JELF
Launches the JELF Terminal in a new window.

RST_SETUP.p:
Usage: EXEC:RST_SETUP
Resets installation flags and reinitializes the installer.
